General.Name: Shenzhen Dvision Video Communica
General.Description: Shenzhen Division Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, and sale of smart video and IoT core technology products and solutions primarily in China. The company offers intelligent solutions, which include smart transportation, smart city management, smart education, smart agriculture, and smart park solutions; and software services, including cloud computing, big data, Internet of Things, mobile Internet, and other fields; data analysis service; and computing services. It is also involved in the smart operations, comprising industrial park operations; e-commerce Saas platform; blockchain Baas platform; and M2C generation platform, as well as operation of IT operations. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Division Video Communications Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Division Co.,Ltd. in December 2017. Shenzhen Division Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: 307, IC Design & Application Ind. Park, Shenzhen, China, 518055
